entries.description: Beta UI for editing and directly invoking AWS SAM debug configurations
AWS Explorer: clicking "Failed to load" node navigates to failure details #1569
SAM Deploy wizard: show recently-used S3 buckets; ability to input S3 bucket name manually #1527
Step Functions: adds ability to publish/update state machine from ASL YAML files.
SAM run/debug: improve display of partial lines #1581
"Create Lambda SAM Application": navigate to README.md instead of template.yaml #1574
